00016 #define COM_TIMEOUT 3                   //!< timeout in seconds
00017 
00018 GarminTransportLayer * GarminTransportLayer::sInstance = NULL;
00019

00026 GarminTransportLayer * GarminTransportLayer::getInstance()
00027 {
00028     if( sInstance == NULL )
00029     {
00030         sInstance = new GarminTransportLayer;
00031         atexit( GarminTransportLayer::destroyInstance );
00032     }
00033     return sInstance;
00034 }
00035 
00036 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 void GarminTransportLayer::destroyInstance()
00040 {
00041     delete sInstance;
00042     sInstance = NULL;
00043 }

00047 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 GarminTransportLayer::GarminTransportLayer()
00049     : mLinkLayer( GarminLinkLayer::getInstance() )
00050 {
00051     mCommError = false;
00052     mLinkLayer->setTransportLayer( this );
00053 }
00054 
00055 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 GarminTransportLayer::~GarminTransportLayer()
00060 {
00061     if( mLinkLayer )
00062     {
00063         mLinkLayer->setTransportLayer( NULL );
00064     }
00065 
00066     while( mAppLayers.size() > 0 )
00067     {
00068         mAppLayers.front()->disconnectTransportLayer();
00069         mAppLayers.pop_front();
00070     }
00071 
00072     while( !mTransmitQueue.empty() )
00073     {
00074         const GarminPacket * packet = mTransmitQueue.front();
00075         mTransmitQueue.pop_front();
00076         delete packet;
00077     }
00078 }
00079 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 void GarminTransportLayer::rx
00090     (
00091     Packet * aPacket
00092     )
00093 {
00094     GarminPacket * thePacket = dynamic_cast<GarminPacket *>( aPacket );
00095     ASSERT( thePacket != NULL );
00096     ASSERT( mAppLayers.size() != 0 );
00097 
00098     // Handle the packet that was received.
00099     switch( thePacket->mPacketId )
00100     {
00101     case ID_ACK_BYTE:
00102         {
00103             //packet was received at client, remove from queue
00104             //and send the next (if there was one)
00105             if( !mTransmitQueue.empty() )
00106             {
00107                 const GarminPacket * packet = mTransmitQueue.front();
00108 
00109                 if( packet->mSender != NULL )
00110                     packet->mSender->onAck( packet );
00111 
00112                 mTransmitQueue.pop_front();
00113                 delete packet;
00114             }
00115             if( !mTransmitQueue.empty() )
00116                 sendPacket();
00117             break;
00118         }
00119     case ID_NAK_BYTE:
00120         //NAK means error in communication...resend the same
00121         // packet again... if there was one
00122         if( !mTransmitQueue.empty() )
00123             sendPacket();
00124         break;
00125     default:
00126         {
00127             // All other packets are sent to the app layer for processing.
00128             AppLayerList::iterator iter;
00129             for( iter = mAppLayers.begin(); iter != mAppLayers.end(); iter++ )
00130             {
00131                 if( (*iter)->rx( thePacket ) )
00132                     break;
00133             }
00134         }
00135     }
00136 }
00137 
00138 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00149 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 void GarminTransportLayer::onTimer()
00151 {
00152     if( !mCommError && !mTransmitQueue.empty() )
00153     {
00154         time_t currentTime;
00155         double elapsed;
00156 
00157         time( &currentTime );
00158         elapsed = difftime( currentTime, mTransmitQueue.front()->mTxTime );
00159         if( elapsed > COM_TIMEOUT )
00160         {
00161             Event::post( EVENT_COMM_TIMEOUT );
00162             mCommError = true;
00163         }
00164     }
00165 }
00166 
00167 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00169 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00170 void GarminTransportLayer::retry()
00171 {
00172     mCommError = false;
00173     sendPacket();
00174 }
00175 
00176 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00191 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00192 void GarminTransportLayer::tx
00193     (
00194     Packet * aPacket,
00195     bool     aSendNow
00196     )
00197 {
00198     GarminPacket * packet = dynamic_cast<GarminPacket *>( aPacket );
00199 
00200     ASSERT( packet != NULL );
00201 
00202     /*----------------------------------------------------------
00203     Local Variables
00204     ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00205     int             i;
00206 
00207     packet->mChecksum = ( packet->mPacketId + packet->mPayloadSize ) & 0xFF;
00208 
00209     //calculate rest of checksum
00210     for( i = 0; i < packet->mPayloadSize; i++ )
00211     {
00212         packet->mChecksum = ( packet->mPayload[i] + packet->mChecksum ) & 0xFF;
00213     }
00214 
00215     //the checksum is the 2's complement of all the data
00216     //in the packet
00217     packet->mChecksum = ( ( packet->mChecksum ^ 0xFF ) + 1 ) & 0xFF;
00218 
00219     if( aSendNow || mTransmitQueue.empty() )
00220     {
00221         mTransmitQueue.push_front( packet );
00222         if( !mCommError )
00223         {
00224             bool result;
00225             result = sendPacket();
00226             if( result )
00227             {
00228                 if( packet->mPacketId == ID_ACK_BYTE ||
00229                     packet->mPacketId == ID_NAK_BYTE )
00230                 {
00231                     mTransmitQueue.pop_front();
00232                     delete packet;
00233                 }
00234             }
00235         }
00236     }
00237     else
00238     {
00239         mTransmitQueue.push_back( packet );
00240     }
00241     return;
00242 }
00243 
00244 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00253 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00254 bool GarminTransportLayer::sendPacket()
00255 {
00256     ASSERT( !mTransmitQueue.empty() );
00257 
00258     GarminPacket *packet = mTransmitQueue.front();
00259 
00260     time( &packet->mTxTime );
00261 
00262     return mLinkLayer->tx( packet );
00263 }
